content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipėda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between two parties jk and sj jk was awarded a mercedes benz ml320 vehicle and compensation of eur 2900 while sj was awarded a chevrolet aveo vehicle and compensation of eur 625 the court considered two articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property jk brought an amended application to court requesting the award of two cars and the declaration of joint liability for certain contracts the court approved a conciliation agreement to settle a debt with the central credit union the court dissolved the marriage made orders regarding the support of the minor child and divided the property the court partially agreed with jk and awarded them a mercedes benz ml320 vehicle worth eur 5800 as well as compensation of eur 2900 sj was awarded a chevrolet aveo vehicle worth eur 1250 and compensation of eur 625 the defendant was ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings
